newsitem.title: SAUDI ARABIA: Saudi King Fahd meets U.S. Defence Secretary Cohen.
newsitem.headline: Saudi King Fahd meets U.S. Defence Secretary Cohen.

text.p: Saudi Arabia's King Fahd and visiting U.S. Defence Secretary William Cohen met on Saturday and reconfirmed the strong relationship between the two allies, U.S. defence officials said.

"They confirmed the firm, unshakeable relations between our two countries," U.S. Defence Department spokesman Ken Bacon told reporters after the meeting that lasted about 30 minutes at the king's palace in Jeddah.
He said that the king "seemed quite lively...he was engaged the whole time".
